pages.text: Mine this block to get Hibiki's $(l:hibiki/items/henshin_onsa)Henshin Onsa$(/l), $(l:hibiki/items/henshin_onibue_ibuki)Henshin Onibue$(/l), and $(l:hibiki/items/henshin_kigen_todoroki)Henshin Kigen$(/l)$(br2)Requires an iron pickaxe or better
